snippet: In the exchanges created by the Affordable Care Act, Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans offer name recognition and price advantages.
abstract: Blue Cross and Blue Shield is finding early success on health exchanges established under the Affordable Care Act, offering affordable, well-established plans across wide range of states; company's name recognition has been major advantage, especially since other large insurers have been more hesitant in entering new market.
lead_paragraph: In the exchanges created by the Affordable Care Act, Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans offer name recognition and price advantages.

headline.main: Blue Cross Plans Jump to an Early Lead
headline.print_headline: Blue Cross Plans Jump to an Early Lead
